mapper.insert:
insert into test_application_item (id, test_application_form_id, sample_name, sample_model, sample_material, sample_description, testing_item, according_to, remark) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.testApplicationFormId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sampleModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sampleMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sampleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.testingItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.accordingTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update test_application_item set test_application_form_id = #{testApplicationFormId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sample_name = #{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sample_model = #{sampleModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sample_material = #{sampleMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sample_description = #{sampleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, testing_item = #{testingItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, according_to = #{accordingTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, test_application_form_id, sample_name, sample_model, sample_material, sample_description, testing_item, according_to, remark from test_application_item where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
